article_node.title: Hyundai Motor America Reports Record-Breaking August 2025 Sales
article_node.summary: Hyundai Motor America posted record August 2025 sales, rising 12% year‑over‑year to 88,523 units and setting new August highs for models such as the IONIQ 5, Palisade, and Elantra HEV.  EV sales jumped 72% and retail sales grew 8%, with electrified vehicles making up 32% of the retail mix.  The momentum underpins Hyundai’s best‑ever year outlook and reinforces its electrification strategy.
